title: I can't log on
body: I can perfectly log on here and everywhere in league but in the game. Its so weird because yesterday I was in my account all day without any errors. It doesnt say im banned, It doesnt say wrong pass or name, It just says Unknown error and that they send a report and then again the forever logging on box. The weirdest part is that I can log in to my other account. I did send a ticket to riot and I am waiting. it got fixed after some hours

replies.body: That's really strange. I wasn't able to find anything about a login server issue recorded on EUNE. Are you still having this issue or is it resolved now?
Same with me ;-; .... I can't login in at all on EUNE, but on EUW it works just fine :/

Same here 
Stuck on logging on then error comes in
Yeah. Have the same issue. Deleting lockfile doesnt help ...
Same here, stuck even if i restarted everything...and i was in a game :( hope i don't get a ban or if i do i ll have to report rito again...{{summoner:6}}
